Name: Low Voltage Switchgear - Capacity: 350 to <750 Amp - Equipment that is either hard anchored or is vibration isolated with seismic snubbers/restraints - Equipment fragility only

GeneralInformation.Description: Costing is per unit and is based upon 400 Amp.
GeneralInformation.Author: Not Given

DamageStates.Description: Damaged, inoperative but anchorage is OK.
DamageStates.RepairMeasures: Replace fiberglass insulator supporting the vertical bus bars in the rear of the switchgear assembly
